title: CalcGREEN 2 : Ch. 3.2 : Affine ODEs and Integration

media:group.media:title: CalcGREEN 2 : Ch. 3.2 : Affine ODEs and Integration
media:group.media:description: If we make a slight change from a linear to an affine 1st order ODE, we can use the same approach of separation and integration to get an answer.
